faqs.question: 1. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing eli?
faqs.answer: We conduct thorough background checks, verify references, check employment history, and conduct in-person interviews. All nannies must also provide proof of relevant certifications.

faqs.question: 2. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing eli?
faqs.answer: We offer a replacement guarantee within the first 30 days. If you're not satisfied with your nanny, we'll help you find a replacement at no additional cost.

faqs.question: 3. Lorem ip sit amet, consectetu olp popor adipiscing eli?
faqs.answer: Nanny rates vary based on experience, qualifications, and responsibilities. We can help you understand market rates and develop a fair compensation package.

faqs.question: 4. Lorem ip sit amet, consectetur adipiscing eli?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can help you find temporary or backup care solutions. Many of our nannies are available for short-term assignments or last-minute care.

faqs.question: 5. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetupiscing eli?
faqs.answer: While individual nannies are typically covered under your homeowners insurance, we recommend additional liability insurance. We can provide guidance on insurance options.

profile.profile_picture_desc: Put a photo where your face is clearly visible
profile.video_upload_desc: Add a friendly tip like, ‚ÄúFamilies love to see your smile!‚Äù
profile.video_guidelines: Make sure your video meets the below guidelines

profile.about_me_placeholder: Tell us about yourself in 150 characters or less to earn your first star!

imageUploader.title: Your photo
imageUploader.instructionsTitle: Show clients the best version of yourself ü§©!

1.title: Use natural lighting
1.description: Position yourself near a window for soft, flattering light.

2.title: Choose a plain background
2.description: Opt for a neutral wall or uncluttered space to avoid distractions.

3.title: Wear professional, approachable clothing
3.description: Select solid-colored tops in soft tones (e.g., light blue, beige).

4.title: Smile warmly with eye contact
4.description: Relax your face and imagine interacting with a child for a genuine expression.

5.title: Use portrait mode on a smartphone
5.description: Have someone take a chest-up shot (no selfies) and lightly adjust brightness.
